revision.text:
We are deeply indebted to the many funding agencies and organizations that have supported SBGN over the years.
The development of SBGN was mainly supported by a grant from the Japanese [http://www.nedo.go.jp New Energy and Industrial Technology Development Organization (NEDO)]. The [http://www.oist.jp Okinawa Institute of Science and Technology (OIST)], the British [http://www.bbsrc.ac.uk/ Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council (BBSRC)] through a ''Japan Partnering Award'', the [http://www.eml-r.org/ European Media Laboratory (EML Research GmbH)], and the [http://bnmc.caltech.edu Beckman Institute BNMC at the California Institute of Technology] provided additional support for SBGN workshops. The [http://www.jst.go.jp/ Japan Science and Technology Agency (JST)] and the ''Genome Network Project'' of the [http://www.mext.go.jp/ Japanese Ministry of Education, Sports, Culture, Science, and Technology (MEXT)] also supported the development of the gene regulation network aspect of SBGN.
